## Public Member Functions

### next() {#af41ce5d552a2f97ed547661bcee5c26e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual Expected&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; Remark &gt; &gt; llvm::remarks::RemarkParser::next ()</>}>
If no error occurs, this returns a valid <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/remark">Remark</a> object.

If an error of type <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/remarks/endoffileerror">EndOfFileError</a> occurs, it is safe to recover from it by stopping the parsing. If any other error occurs, it should be propagated to the user. The pointer should never be null.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarkparser-h/#l00053">53</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarkparser-h">RemarkParser.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
